name: EYE (Fahimul Bari's Studio)
description:
<A Game By Fahimul Bari/> EYE [O] Genre: 2D Shooter & A little Strategy Game Explain: Convert a certain number of enemies to pass levels!! Controls:  Windows:  W A S D - Movement  O - Fire P - Convert Enemy

<|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||/>

Made This Game For A Game-Jam (Brain Station -23 Presents "Hack A Jam") within 3 days. I hope this game won't disappoint you. More or less!  Just Play it.  It's Free!!
